item.description:
SAD AS IT IS, THIS WEEKS OUTDOOR TENNIS MEETUP WILL BE THE LAST ONE FOR THE CURRENT YEAR DUE TO THE LACK OF LIGHT AND THE COLDER CONDITIONS! FOR THOSE THAT WILL BE ATTENDING THIS MEET UP AS, WELL AS ANYONE ELSE WHO DID PLAY WITH US THIS PAST YEAR.... YOU ARE ALL INVITED AFTER TENNIS TO A PIZZA AND WINE PARTY AT MY HOME IN WEST HARTFORD. ADDRESS TO BE GIVEN TO THOSE THAT SIGNED IN - WHETHER YOU ARE PLAYING OR JUST JOINING US FOR THE PARTY!!!






It's supposed to be a nice evening on Wednesdayy, so let's get together and play

tennis - 5:00 (new start time) till 7:00. We will be playing

at the tennis courts at Conard High in West Hartford - just off Exit 41 on I-84.

All levels are invited. Obviously rain will cancel the event.

Looking to play tennis at least once a week through the summer and early fall, and

I am looking to have YOU join us !!!

BTW...If you have any questions, contact Stuart at 860-985-5198.

Perhaps after tenns we could stop for dinner if desired ????

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: TENNIS AFTER WORK
